content.detailedDescription: It started 3 weeks ago & is on going still, a white orb travel back & fourth west to east, south to north & sometimes takes off in to space.  i have talked with many people in area. there is a milatary presence around & they see me viewing the ufos.
content.summary: On going over 3 weeks, some times takes off into space. wite orbs. i have talked with lots of locals.

content.detailedDescription:
At 9:15 pm i was walking my dogs at a park on 42nd st and campbell. my friend margaret joined me at about 9:45 pm we were standing on the south west corner of campbell and 42nd street, i was facing west and margaret was facing east with my dogs between us. what made this siting extremely weird for me, was that i was telling margaret about a blue orb my friend jim recorded on his phone on august 5th and again on august 14th at around 9:00pm (7:00pm pst) in fort worth texas (i have the videos, he isn't very tech savvy so i will be helping him file a report). margaret asked me something to the effect of, "what do you mean by a dancing blue light? you mean like on a plane?" at that moment, i noticed what appeared to be an aircraft with a bright light out of the corner of peripheral vision to the south west. i turned to get a better look at the light, and as i did, i noticed it was a bright, pulsating baby blue light, making erratic maneuvers in between two large trees. it seemed to hug the tree line as it danced. it was hovering, darting down and up at high rates of speed. i exclaimed, "it looked just like that!" margaret turned around to see what i was screaming about. she said, "oh, that's a," and as she was trying to explain it for me, it started darting up then down, then made a circle motion parallel to the ground. i reached for my phone to take a video, but as quickly as it appeared, it disappeared behind the trees.
we stood on the corner trying to rationalize what we saw. at about 9:50, the object returned, margaret said it had to be a bug under a street light, but that theory was quickly abandoned when we noticed that this light was higher than all the surrounding telephone poles and trees. as the orb danced it started to pulsate on, off, on, bright, dim, then it darted to the east, away from our field of view.
content.summary: Blue light pulsating between tree line. made fast maneuvers, disappeared and reappeared, only to vanish behind tree line. 10 minutes later, flash from within trees closer to my location.

content.detailedDescription:
At 9:15 pm i was walking my dogs at a park on 42nd st and campbell. my friend margaret joined me at about 9:45 pm we were standing on the south west corner of campbell and 42nd street, i was facing west and margaret was facing east with my dogs between us. what made this siting extremely weird for me, was that i was telling margaret about a blue orb my friend jim recorded on his phone on august 5th and again on august 14th at around 9:00pm (7:00pm pst) in fort worth texas (i have the videos, he isn't very tech savvy so i will be helping him file a report). margaret asked me something to the effect of, "what do you mean by a dancing blue light? you mean like on a plane?" at that moment, i noticed what appeared to be an aircraft with a bright light out of the corner of peripheral vision to the south west. i turned to get a better look at the light, and as i did, i noticed it was a bright, pulsating baby blue light, making erratic maneuvers in between two large trees. it seemed to hug the tree line as it danced. it was hovering, darting down and up at high rates of speed. i exclaimed, "it looked just like that!" margaret turned around to see what i was screaming about. she said, "oh, that's a," and as she was trying to explain it for me, it started darting up then down, then made a circle motion parallel to the ground. i reached for my phone to take a video, but as quickly as it appeared, it disappeared behind the trees.
we stood on the corner trying to rationalize what we saw. at about 9:50, the object returned, margaret said it had to be a bug under a street light, but that theory was quickly abandoned when we noticed that this light was higher than all the surrounding telephone poles and trees. as the orb danced it started to pulsate on, off, on, bright, dim, then it darted to the east, away from our field of view.
content.summary: Blue light pulsating between tree line. made fast maneuvers, disappeared and reappeared, only to vanish behind tree line. 10 minutes later, flash from within trees closer to my location.

content.detailedDescription: Started on the 14th of august in the west bright light very bright dropped at a right angle very fast above where a friend resides so rang them as i was establishing what id seen they too noticed it as being a cigar shape right above them before zooming off the following day at 12;30am on the 15th of august as plane was flying past to the south 2 bright lights descended at great speeds again parallel to each other behind the plane when measured against the chimney pots on the houses these things were very big
content.summary: 3 very big & fast lights dropping & ascending

content.detailedDescription: The object appeared about 10 pm and disapperared and then reappeared the second object i didnt see untiil i reviewed the video but the third object i saw with the nacked eye.
content.summary: It hovered and turn diffrent directions

content.detailedDescription: Saw bright light flashing in the sky it pulsated flashing and the vanished then reapeared. then i saw a second one appear out of nowhere. and towards the final disapearence of the object and thired one appeared just over the top of it and disaperaed into no where.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Blinking light that was small then grew and turned bright in the night sky

content.detailedDescription: Husband was outside on the patio, he started knocking on the door for me to hurry up and come outside, and that there was something in the sky that he didnt know what it was. i stepped outside on the porch and he pointed up to what he was seeing and i looked in the direction and the only way to say what it looked like is that it was round shaped, glowing red, moving in a north direction than turning slightly to the east for a north east direction, moving at a steady pace then going up higher till it was out of site. later on that same evening, about an hour and ahalf later, directly above us a bright glowing triangle shaped object apeared out of know where. it was visualy closer then the red object, it really scared me, because i could make out the outline of it and it was so bright, ive never seen anything like it, it also was moving in a north east direction and seemed to go up and disapear, we saw one more just like it later on and it also was moveing north east and went up and dipapeared. after that last one i went inside, i had decided id seen enough. these things that we saw were not airplanes, helicopters, balloons ect.. very strange.
content.summary: Saw 2 triangle white glowing ufos and 1 red round glowing ufo in the same night.

content.detailedDescription: In bed w/ my husband sleeping, awakened by intense vibration, bedroom aglow w/ bright green light.Light then dimmed,then event repeated 3 more times, each time lasting 5-10 seconds. i awoke my husband at the first and he experienced the last 3 events. heavy cloud cover. no thunder/lightning storm in progress. the vibration/pulse was felt physically. the house did not shake or vibrate. there were no explosions. we both felt an overwhelming fear and agitation and were unable to sleep afterward. there was nothing to be seen or heard. spoke w/ township workers, no electrical disturbance on our street that night, no evidence of electrical wires having been touched, wires are all clear of tree branches.
content.summary: 4 distinct pulsating vibrations accompanied by intense green lights

content.detailedDescription:
Object at first appeared like a star  almost staionary? it then moved west and then made an arc and moved north. it appeared starlike at first but then got very bright as it was directly overhead - like venus at its brightest. it then faded out of sight. while it was overhead, it seemed pretty close - like a low flying prop-plane. but there was absolutley no noise and no flashing lights that you would expect from an airplane. 

no idea what it was.
content.summary: Bright silent starlike object that arced across the sky from west to north.

content.detailedDescription: On 8/14/11 i was in my backyard in ne seattle (lake city) at 9:10 pm pdt when i noticed a large very bright steady red light at about 30-40 degrees elevation to the east, moving slowly south. just before it moved behind some trees it changed direction slightly toward the southeast. i walked to the street to try to see it again and saw a similarly sized bright white light now traveling north at the same elevation.  it moved north for about 20 seconds, the veered to the ne and slowly got dimmer until i couldn't see it.  it's apparent speed was about 1/2 degree (width of full moon) per second, but it might have sped up after it turned to the ne and moved away from me. no blinking lights, no sound that i could hear.  i couldn't make out a shape. its apparent size was at least 4 times larger than the iss, like a small aspirin held at arms length. it was partly cloudy with the full moon below it in the east, but i didn't notice if the light was in front of the clouds or in clear sky.
content.summary: Bright red-orange light moving south, then white moving north

content.detailedDescription:
One night during the summer, me and my dad were playing basketball outside on the driveway of our house on our lighted basketball net, when, out of nowhere, we saw a huge, but silent, ufo. it was very bright white and no more than 5 miles away. it was so bright it was hard to look at. it was definitely not a man-made craft!!! me and my dad were both stunned and stood there for many moments after the ufo had passed by, trying to figure out what we had just seen. there were no helicopters, airplanes, searchlights, or anything like that in the sky the whole time we were out there playing basketball. the ufo looked like it was descending at a diagonal angle away from us and after about 8 to ten seconds, it vanished behind the trees where we could no longer see it. my dad was never a ufo believer, but after that night, he was convinced that we had witnessed an alien ufo sighting. from some research i have conducted, it seems like the type of craft that the alien grays would fly, but i cant be sure. to this day, me and my dad are still very surprised from what we saw, and will never forget that night. sadly, me and my dad did not have a any camera or video device outside with us and it would have been to late if we ran inside to get one, for the ufo moved very fast! 



p.S. 

these past few years i have had many sleep problems and have been waking up consistently every night for reasons unknown. i am currently investigating this problem. the strange thing is, i never ever had sleep problems until after this ufo sighting.

thank you.
content.summary: Very bright glowing white ufo in sky.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife, daughter and i were returning home shortly after sunset last friday night, driving east on highway 12 just west of cambridge, wi. i saw a floating orange light at about 1 o'clock, floating perhaps 200 feet in the air. i pointed it out to my wife and daughter and they saw it too. it looked to me like a glowing orange light bulb, and i could not distinguish any shape of the object. it appeared to hover or float in one spot the whole time we observed it. after a few moments of observation, my daughter said, "i keep trying to imagine a tower holding it up, but there's no tower."

we observed it for perhaps a minute or two, then lost sight of it. it never moved the entire time we saw it. i wish we had pulled over to observe it more closely!
content.summary: Floating light observed from car going down highway

content.detailedDescription: Sunday august 14th around 8pm mountain time my friend (name removed from report)flg 08/15/11 stopped by. he works at a local lumber yard and does all the cad and architectutal work for them. i am building a greenhouse on the south side of my house and he was going to help me with some problems i had ran into. around 8:30pm my wife came out to say hi and we sat down on the deck and started visiting. the sun had just gone down and it was starting to get get a little darker but still blue in the sky with only a little cloud cover. i started to watch the sky cause i have been constantly for the past week observing the perseid meteor shower. (the past two nights my wife and i have spent the night at my grandparents farm north of town in the middle of no where. we followed all the guidelines from websites and nasa, like no lights, adjust your eyes, where to look, etc. we did everything and got a great show!) so at 8:43pm i see a bright white star looking shape (looked just like which ever planet was just below and to the east of perseus constellation that was really bright all night) rise from behind a cloud in the southern sky. just as i saw what i thought was another meteor it became 4x larger and brighter and started moving straight up really fast. with in a second it became tiny again like a star and just kept flying straight up till it disappeared. i am 30 years old and have always had a fascination for space. i have always watched the stars and hoped to see a ufo. and what i saw tonight was like nothing i have ever seen before. not like a shooting star or the meteors or a plane. this thing went straight up from where i was like it was following my zenith.
content.summary: White star like from behind cloud became huge and bright then small and flew straight up

content.detailedDescription: I was in jalisco, mexico visiting family and sites.  when i came home and uploaded my picture, i saw this object in one!
content.summary: Jalisco object over church

content.detailedDescription:
I just got out of the movie theater and was walking to the car with my g/f. i happened to look up and noticed the sun was blocked by a belltower decorating the top of the buildings, and j could see a halo/corona around the sun. i suddenly noticed there was a bright star like object to the right of where the sun was covered and it was hovering. i pointed it out to my girlfriend, who noticed it as well. it suddenly started to rise, then dipped and rose again. it started to ascend. when it got to the blue part of the sky, my girlfriend lost sight of it, but it was still clearly visible to me. it looked like a white orb, and it started moving very quickly in my direction. even though i tried pointing it out to her again she couldn't see it. it moved very quickly, seemingly gaijin acceleration, and as it got closer it got smaller. when it passed overhead it appeared grey in color, but te edges were indistinct (it almost looked fuzzy). i had a very long sighting in 2008, where i saw a purple orb that changed into a trapezoidal shape, however this orb looked very different. my g/f asked me again where it was, and i looked away for a second and it was gone. 
no sound, could not have been a balloon or an airplane, and was travelling at a very high rate of speed. 
we both agreed it was unidentified, flying and an object.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.shape: Circle,   Diamond,   Disc,   Egg,   Oval,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Teardrop
content.summary: Ufo next to the sun. it seemed to go down then up then shot across the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Please listen to my story,this is exactly 100 percent as i witnessed it with no over doing it what so ever,here is 110 % what happened"-

march 20th 2010 gaylord michigan,i was 18 years old at the time. i along with my twin brother and grandmother were at wal-mart shopping. we came out of the store and got in the car and noticed a group of people in the parking lot looking up in the sky and we didn't think much of it. we were driving home and stopped at the shell gas station. as soon as we pulled in to the shell - to our left about 400-500 feet of the ground out of nowhere appeared 5 to 7 orange orbs,they hovered stationary for no more than 4 seconds and disappeared into thin air,10 seconds later the orange orbs appeared in a totally different formation about 15 feet to the right and hovered again for no more than 4 seconds and disappeared. about 1 minute later a single orb appeared out of nowhere and hovered for a few seconds and this time my brother had the camera out "sony cyber shot" and he filmed this orb which again disappeared into thin air. so next we start driving home,in the middle of the woods literally following our rout on the left side of the car appear again 5 to 7 orbs,they floated for a few seconds and disappeared,we witnessed these 3/4 times in the woods while driving home - over a length of a half a mile. we get home and in front of our house 25 feet in the middle of the woods was a single orange orb-we were scared by this time and ran in the house. my brother went to uploading this video on youtube and i went out front to see if i could see any more orbs,peeking out the front door i see 2 black fancy cars just flying down our street. never do people go so fast down our street,this was out of the ordinary. after seeing nothing else orb wise i go back inside and my brother has the video uploaded to youtube - literally 30 minutes later we see a light coming through the blinds and we jumped up thinking it was another orb,me with camera in hand,we open the blinds and 25 feet directly in front of our house and 30 feet off the ground was helicopter shining a spotlight directly in our window blinding me and my brother,now all we could hear was a silent swooshing sound - now ive flown on a helicopter before in florida and it was loud. how can a chopper 25 feet out in front of us be so silent? i dont know much about choppers but i didnt think they had models that were so silent. after seeing the chopper out there we shut the blinds and were scared to death,1 minute later we hear this absolutely odd screeching high pitched drilling sound right outside our house - it sounded like someone was drilling or sawing the side of our house. alright by that time i had it - i went and grabbed by 7.62 russian rifle,my brother was horrified and called the police screaming at the dispatcher to send the police to our house that second and that someones outside our house,my brother an 18 year old adult was crying he was so scared. my grandmother during all this was in her bedroom sleeping,by the time she got up my brother was on the phone with the police and she took the phone from him and talked with the dispatcher,the dispatch told my grandmother - oh it just the military doing maneuvers. so is part of military training sending a chopper out to someones house to hover 25 feet in front and 30 feet above shining a spotlight directly in their window?????? i dont think so. i myself believe somehow they knew we filmed those orbs and seen the video on youtube. i dont know,what i do know is that someone in control of a chopper was sent to scare the hell out of us and they succeeded in their job. the noise.... i'm yet to find out what in the world that was,never before or again have i heard that noise. my grandmother also heard the noise from her bedroom. the call from my brother has to be documented in the police archives here. after it all settled we deleted the video from youtube. it is seen on youtube now however,a while later we got the video uploaded to youtube again and have not had any problems yet. now i did some research online and fellow people here in gaylord also reported seeing these orange orbs the exact same date and exact same time as we did - march 30th 2010 around 8:00 pm. we seen the orbs an additional 2 more times over the past year and my grandmother seen them by herself just a few months ago. i have recently purchased an hd camera in hope of catching these orbs again,there is something very very strange going on in our little city of gaylord. thats my story 110% as it happened with no nonsense attached. i just felt i have to let someone know what happened to us that night,i cant hold it in. and i am scared reporting my story to this website,let me say i'm going to be watching my back after i submit this... thats my event and it changed my life.
content.summary: Orange orbs - appeared out of this air - possible government contact

content.detailedDescription:
Walking facing sw watching some meteor shower activity with a few visible high jets in the surrounding night sky. suddenly noticed a very bright golden light heading straight for me from due sw on the horizon approaching steady but fast. 
 i initially thought it was the iss since i know it would be in the area. i immediately noted the time, 947pm west coast. the object flew directly towards me then overhead. i stopped to watch it very carefully, thinking i was going to see the outline of the iss. as it approached i noticed its path was not entirely straight as it fluttered side to side slightly. thinking this odd for the iss i continued to watch now more intently. the object became much brighter and i was sure this was sunlight reflecting. it seemed to slow and headed out more or less on the same trajectory due ne from eugene oregon. 

 i noted the time and as soon as i got home one hour later i looked up the iss realtime path online and noted it was indeed flying over oregon at sometime, however, the iss path is going the opposite way, from nw to se. so, i either saw the brightest reflection from an orbiting body that i have ever seen, ( and i have seen 100's) or it was the iss and the data online is wrong... or i saw something reportable and worthy of reporting on this forum in case someone else has seen the like tonight. 

  the object seemed to slow considerably as it headed due ne and blacked out when the reflecting light was lost off it. clearly higher than the 2 high flying jets beneath it in the area as i watched it go away. 

 nothing would be worthy of noting here accept the fluttering, side to side movements.
content.summary: Bright orb golden light from sw to ne slight flutterring

content.detailedDescription:
it was sometime in the spring, or early summer. it was hiding behind a cloud. or should i say it was surrounded by what appeared to be a cloud.I had seem this cloud for 3 days. it did not move. and it was the only cloud around. the rest of the sky was clear and it was dark in color. 
at first i thought it was a storm cloud. but the weatherman never said anything about rain. but it never moved for 3 days. and it stayed in the same spot and height. it has been a while. so i might not remember everything. 
    anyway. it was about 9pm. i went outside. and focused on the cloud to see if it was still there. i was outside for about an hour. when i saw a small lighted object appear in he sky. i shined my spotlight at it. after a few minutes maybe 5. i saw theese bright lights  off to the north of me.At first i thought it was a plane or jet. there were what seemed about 6 lights in a vertical row. 
    as i watched i saw it start to descend. at first i thought it was going to land at the airport. but it was to big. as i watched it i noticed it was getting closer to where i was. and as it did the lights went from 6-4-2-1. i thought for sure it was going to crash. then fear set in. i hid behind my car. 
    my son was with me now.I would peek over the top of the car as it kept getting closer. then i told my son i think were in trouble. next thing i know,i saw it pass slowly by me and my son. and now it was hovering just above the treetops. no more then 12ft. from us. or at least 10-12steps away. 
    as it hovered i tried to move to a better spot to see if i could see anything on top. and i saw what might have been a dome. anyway it was between 10:15 10:30pm by now. my son was knelt down by the car. i was able to get to a spot from a short distance. i could see part of it. the other was hid by the trees and the roof of my house. anyway, i told my son. i am going to walk over to it,and stand underneath it. 
    as i approached my fear was gone. i was now standing under it. and i could feel an energy beam around me. and a slight humming noise. i could also see a light surrounding me. i was looking at my son and i was talking to him, but he couldn't hear me. and it was like i was talking into a fan. i could see fear in his eyes. then i looked at my watch it was abt 1030 or so as i stood underneath it. 
   when i looked at my watch again, an hour had passed , i noticed as we walkedf away. i don't remember if my son stood underneath it with me or not. i tried to talk him into it. but just can't remember if he did or not. then we walked away from it, as i turned i saw it take off. i don't remember what happened after that. i go some stories i could tell. btw, i been trying to talk to someone from mufon or any place that deals with ufo's. but no one has come around. just to let you know.  
i can spot them at night, if i want to as long as the sky are clear. and its good and dark. oh before i forget i want you to know i have other wittnesses from other sightings who were with me when i saw other crafts. i am sorry i don't have any other proof. other then my eyes as  well as other people.
content.summary: Its hard to say. i need more then 25 words.

content.detailedDescription:
While having a family campfire at a family cottage near the ocean i observed a flash of light on the edge of a cloud and a star like white light appear and fly in an easterly direction.  this happened at approx 22:00 it flew out of site and was around the size of a star; it was around 1000-2000 ft up in the sky and at a constant speed, 400-500 mph.  
  at 22:21 i noticed a light in the westerly sky a little bigger than venus and much brighter, the light was ball shaped and has arcs of light coming horizontally from the center, similar to the diamond ring during an eclipse.  the light headed straight at us and didn't seem very high in the sky, may be 1500 ft up.  it kept a constant speed and slowly desended to 750-1000 ft and was traveling may be 100 mph.  there was no sound from the object and when it was overhead it looked like there was a central light and the arcs were reflections on a silvery surface.  it kept a constant speed and headed south east and seemed to gain height an flew.Into mist.
 there was a full moon and clouds in the sky, stars were visible.  there was alot of air traffic going to halifax airport and they flew over head all night.  the object came from a different direction, was much lower, had no navigation lights and made no sound.
 it was to slow to be a meteorite, to big to be a satellite and way to low.   i like astronomy and have a telescope so i know it wasn't a star or a planet.
i would like to find out what it was. my wife and uncle saw it too.
content.summary: Star like light descended flew overhead then asended

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i went out front of the house and observer several airplanes and 1 object that glowed very bright traveling away from us in a ne direction. it had no blinking lights.
content.summary: Glowing object seen in the ne sky

content.detailedDescription:
I wnt outside at 850pm to work on my lights in front of the house. i saw 2-3 planes in the sky as well as a bright object traveling away from us with no blinking lights. the planes did not react to the object, but all the planes had blinking lights. my wife also saw this object. i grabbed my binoculars to get a better look at the object, but still did not observe any blinking lights on the object.

the object travelled in a straight line away from us, but then slightly turn right a little for a few seconds, then back to the left for a few seconds. it then proceed straight ahead and i lost it behind a tall tree in my neighbors yard.
content.summary: Glowing object traveling away from us - glowing - changing path slightly

content.detailedDescription: Myself and a friend where sitting outside on my deck by a small campfire talking.  it was very clear and there was a full moon.  i looked up into the sky and noticed a greenish white light, starlike moving from the northeast at a high rate of speed.  the big dipper was in the northwest sky and the ufo travled in what appeared to be across it.  the light was constant and did not pulse or change but it did fade out as it got further to the west southwest.  then the same light appeared again moving from the south to the east at the same rate of speed and then faded out again. no variation in the light or pulsating.  we continued to watch the sky for a couple of minutes and the same light appeared again moving in the same direction as it did when we first spotted it (from the northeast) at the same time there was a jet liner coming across the sky from the south with the typical blinking red light and we could see the contrail and hear the jet, but at no time did we hear any noise from the ufo.  the jet liner crossed the path of the ufo but seemed to be at a lower altitude than the ufo. the ufo was moving at a high rate of speed, faster then the jet liner.  again the ligt faded out and we did not see it again after this.  approx. 15 mins. later a bright metorite came across the sky from north to south.
content.summary: Star like light greenish white traveling from various directions at a high altitude and high rate of speed.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home from a friends house at about 2am on my motorcycle. i was watching some lights in the sky thinking it was a plane. as it drew closer i could see a bluish white light, a reddish light, and a greenish light in a triangle formation. with a light at each tip. as it came closer, i stopped my motorcycle to watch it more, so i wouldn't crash. as i was sitting there it got closer and i realized it wasn't a plane because it was far too low in the sky to be one. as it came towards me, it hovered over me about 600 ft in the air above me. what freaked me out so bad was that there was no movement of the air around me, no sound at all, no vibration, just nothing, like the entire earth stood still. i am a very level headed person, and don't believe anything i hear. i have to see before i believe. what i saw, made me piss myself. driving a motorcycle with wet pants is never fun. it hovered over me for about 5 minutes, the whole time i was just praying for it to go away, move away from me. by the time i got home, i was a crying, stinking mess.
last year, i was watching a show on tv, and i saw on that show, exactly what i saw over me. there were mass sightings in arizona about the same time mine happened. and they described the same thing, and the video looked exactly the same.
content.summary: Flew straight then hovered above me

content.detailedDescription: My fiance, sister and i where in my backyard taking a night dip in the pool due to the unusually hot weather.  my fiance then grabbed my attention to a large white fireball that was emitting pieces out the back.  this object was pretty far off in the distance, decending in a  south, south west direction.  the entire show lasted for around 4-6 seconds approximetely.  i started to question myself and think of what it could have been.  there was no noise, no sonic boom of anykind (at the rate it was going and for as large as it was, there is no doubt it would have made one). it was not up in the atmosphere, it was below and close!  not close to where it would cause a panic, but close enough to see the discharging of small white "ambers" come from the back of it. i couldn't be sure of what it really was, but it was quite exciting to see it.
content.summary: Bright white fireball in the sky

content.detailedDescription: Myself and 3 other friends were outside on the porch when i laid down on the concrete to look up at the sky. i was relaxing, watching the planes go by when suddenly this white ball shaped ufo flys in from the left to right. it was right above our house!!! it started doing mini circles in clockwise and counter-clockwise circle motions. very much like wax on, wax off. we all saw it. then it paused. i shit you not, it literally felt like it was onto us. when suddenly it vanished. we are completely blown away. i yelled out into the air, i just saw a ufo!! wtf was that?!?! it was a dream come true. there is a little more to story. if anyone would like to meet us at the location, we are all willing to interview.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: White ball ufo spins clockwise then counter-clockwise, stops and vanishes

content.detailedDescription: I  had got up at  2 am to watch the preaides  meteror shower    saw bright  slow moveing light it had no shape just a very very large  bright light   100 to 150 feet  above me  at  418 am 8-12-11  it moved  from the north  west  to the south east    with  no sound at all   nor did i see any dark mass above it   it was not a  plane or  hot air ballon  it had no blinking ights  and it was not drifting with the wind ( c )  of the light was  white      lasted mabey 5 to 6 m        did not think to use my 20 by 60 bicnulars  to  get better look
content.summary: A very  large  brite slow moveing light

content.detailedDescription: On aug. 13 2011 i went out side to watch for meteros. i sat behind my out building so the yard light wou't be effecting my night vision as much. i was fasing east clouds in the distance but not overhead. the full moon was comming up but it was behind a large mapel tree. i could see the north star , caseopia was just above the corn in field . [ corn in field is 10 to 11 ft. tall.]  i saw 1 meteror and lots of planes. then i saw a sattlelight moving from south to north seemed to move faster than wons i have seen befor. it was not directley over head but at a angle to the east . as it got even with the direction i was looking it turnd from white to a blueis purple and got 4 to 5 times larger lasted only about 1/2 a second then back white . stayed at the same speed the hole time. i wached it till it went into the clouds to the north. i though what the     (****** word deleted)flg 08/14/11 flg  was that  thought how could a satalight do that. it seemed it was ponted at me or was meant for me . allmost seemed like a laser .  i wached the sky for another 1/2 houre then went in to the house. i know this dosen't sound much like a ufo but i have watch the night sky for years and never seen any thing like this before.
content.summary: Saw satalight  turned into bright blue to purple and got larger then back to star like

content.detailedDescription: In early 1997, my friend and i got off work around 2am. we ate dinner at a 24 hr dennys and started driving home. his car had a sun roof and i saw a weird, huge thing in the sky, almost directly above us. i told him to stop and we got out of the car. we were standing right in the middel of one of the main roads in grass valley. we stood there watching it move very slowly for 5 minuits untill it finally went over some big trees and we lost sight. we chased after the ship, but roads are few and far between there ande we never cought up with it. it was a huge triangle shaped ship with 3 redish, circleular lights on the bottom. i haven't seen my friend since 1998, but i'm sure he will tell you the same thing. this has bothered me for 14 years now. i have seen other simalur storys on diffrend shows. my sighting seems to have been longer and more close up than any other i've seen. people please belive me! i have no reason to lie. what i saw was real and not from earth!!!!!!!!
content.summary: My friend and i got outa the car and watched it right above us for about 5 min. no noise, and it was huge. the ship was shimmery is the only way i can explain. please call me, its a 5 min story.

content.detailedDescription:
it was august 13th, a group of 6 were out in my brother's back field watching the perseid meteor sprinkle (shower).  had been out there about 1-1/2 hours, saw about 10 meteors. not a great showing with the full moon.  we were just about to give up for the night; i stood up still staring at the sky hoping to see a straggler meteor. then saw an orange-yellow light.... like a very very bright star. i told the others. at this time one of the six people had returned to the house, but there were still two adults, two 17 year old kids and one 12 year old. at first i thought it was a plane but the light never blinked. we all saw the object, i thought it was slightly oval, my brother thought it was a round light; my son thought it was slightly oval.  my nephew (the 12 year old)  thought he saw the actual lights, he described it as having yellow light bulbs hanging from the bottom��� no one else thought that, maybe he has the best eye sight, or the best imagination. it slowly descended behind some trees, not straight up and down, but at a (maybe) 15-20 degree angle��� again, very slow. we could see it behind the trees here and there, for about one minute, and then it was so low we finally lost sight. we waited for about a half hour, to see if it ever ascended (it never did).  it was due north; there are no airports anywhere near then��� nothing but the small town of farmington.  my brother estimates it was about a mile and half away.  i have no idea, i���m not a good judge of distance when i have no idea how big the objects was��� to us, it appeared about the size of a pea.
   we are about 30 minutes from the pease international trade port (previously the pease af base. there was an air show during the afternoon (and again this afternoon) but the airport is in the complete opposite direction.  there were planes out and about, but they were very clearly airplanes��� blinking lights, and most were close enough to hear the engines.  this would appear to have been closer, but no sound what-so-ever. 

earlier when still watching for meteors, we saw about 5 other unidentified objects slowly moving across the sky. these were all like tiny distant stars, that were moving across the sky. all different directions, opposite of the meteors, some even appeared to be coming straight down.  i have seen satellites through binoculars before, they were similar but the light was random as the sun caught them��� these objects didn���t seem to blink or dim (until they were lost in the light of the moon).  these were like tiny stars, even appeared to be as far away  as the stars but we know they could not have been.  i really would have thought them to be satellites if they appeared to be tumbling but they were not. 

please let me know if you have any questions.   
take care
content.summary: Bright orange lgiht descending slowly into the trees

content.detailedDescription: At the time of the sighting my girlfriend and i were camping 8 miles east of the town of piedmont sd, east of the black hills of south dakota. i awoke around 4am and went outside of our cabin (for some unknown reason) to  have a look at the night sky, since i am an avid skywatcher. there from the porch i looked to the west when i saw an extremely bright light flying at approximately 1000 feet towards the south. this object flew at about the same velocity of a private airplane and was pulsating the same as an arc welder would (with the same light intensity) with intermitant flashings of faint red and  blue lights... red on the left side and blue on the right side of the object. this sighting lasted several minutes when i noticed a 2nd identical object about to cross its path traveling from east to west. this scenario played out for sveral more minutes until the objects crossed paths about 3 0r 4 miles away from me. the object then faded from my view. this is not the first sighting of this kind i have had in fact, this is the 4th time i have awakened at this time of night, for the same inexplicable reason. it seems that i am being awakend from my sleep just to observe these kinds of objects. at first i thought it was wonderful but now i am concerned as to what reason this has been happening to me. as i mentioned above, this has been my 4th sighting of this type in about a two-year time frame.
content.summary: Flight from north to south crossing paths with 2nd identical object flying from east  to west
